title: Remove duplicate time offset adjustment from homepage

requirements.text: Remove the time offset adjustment UI component from the homepage that displays 'Saat Düzeltmesi' (Clock Adjustment), 'Diyanet'e göre dakika farkı (+ veya -)' label, the offset input control, and current adjustment display ('Şu anki düzeltme: X dakika'), since this functionality already exists in the Settings page

quotes: Anasayfada bulunan saat düzeltmesi penceresini kaldır zaten ayarlar kısmında var
ana ekranda bulunan şu pencereden bahsediyorum aynısı ayarlar kısmında da var. Saat Düzeltmesi Diyanet'e göre dakika farkı (+ veya -) 0 Şu anki düzeltme: 0 dakika

acceptanceCriteria: The time offset adjustment component is no longer visible on the homepage
The time offset adjustment functionality remains fully functional in the Settings page
No visual gaps or layout issues appear on the homepage after removal

constraints: Do not modify the time offset adjustment functionality in the Settings page
Preserve all other homepage components and their functionality
nonGoals: Changing how time offset is stored or calculated
Modifying the Settings page time offset UI
Adding new features to the homepage
